players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "Bob, I know you saw me kill Alice last night. Keep an eye on me."
Diana: "I think Charlie is the mafioso, he's trying to deflect attention from himself by accusing Bob. I want everyone to keep an eye on him."
You: "Charlie is the mafioso, I've investigated him and found evidence. We should lynch him today."
